attributes.action: Get Henderson’s to make a Yorkshire Relish Sauce.
attributes.additional_details: We all love relish on our stews, pies, cheese on toast etc etc.  But imagine a thick sauce you could dunk chips, have on a sandwich, a burger, on toast, a full English breakfast. The possibilities are endless.
attributes.background:
Henderson’s relish was created over
100 years ago, and has been a cupboard staple in every Sheffield home since.  In this time nothing has changed.
It is now time for a revolution in Sheffield’s best loved condiment. Making the great flavour into a sauce would open up a new world of opportunities.
